title: Streaming Connection Manager
description: Build a connection manager that handles the complete streaming lifecycle.
instructions:
Create a StreamingConnectionManager class that:

1. Opens and maintains a streaming connection
2. Tracks connection state (disconnected, connecting, connected, reconnecting)
3. Implements automatic reconnection with exponential backoff
4. Exposes a stream of connection state changes
5. Properly disposes all resources

Requirements:
- Maximum 5 reconnection attempts
- Backoff delays: 1s, 2s, 4s, 8s, 16s
- Expose connectionState as a Stream
- Include a manual reconnect() method
- Cancel all timers and subscriptions in dispose()
expectedOutput: A fully functional StreamingConnectionManager that handles connection lifecycle with automatic reconnection using exponential backoff.

hints.text: Use a StreamController<ConnectionState> to expose the connection state as a stream.
Calculate exponential backoff delay with: Duration(seconds: 1 << (attempts - 1)) where attempts starts at 1.
Store the Timer reference so you can cancel it in dispose() and when a new reconnection is scheduled.
